subtitle:
Busan's #Gukje (Korean for "International") #Market was started by the #Korean War #refugees as a means of survival - selling whatever they had with them for food.

Today, it's 1 of Korea's largest open-air, indoor markets selling pretty much everything!

https://nengyishi.com/2016/12/27/gukje-market/¬†‚Ä¶pic.twitter.com/AKA4sIfgfD
